'''0.9487<ref name="blog">{{link |url=https://kulttuuri.tumblr.com/post/11069208929/teacher-password-and-skin-selection-implemented|title=Teacher password and skin selection implemented |date=October 5, 2011 |website=Tumblr|author=Aleksi Postari}}</ref>''' is a major update to MinecraftEdu. It is based on [[Java Edition Beta 1.8.1]]. Which adds a logging in screen.

== Additions ==
'''Logging in... screen'''<ref>[[MinecraftEdu mod 0.9487#Testvan's Logs|MinecraftEdu logs]]: "''[12:23] <@kultuuri> Skin selection from starting GUI, serverside password for using teacher interface, port to 1.8.1" (September 28, 2011)''</ref>
* "I am student" option allows the player to choose their outfit and connect to the server as a student.
